name: GeoNetwork Data Catalog for Spatial Data Infrastructures
description: A catalog to manage spatially referenced resources. It provides powerful metadata editing and search functions as well as an interactive web map viewer.
data_themes: geospatial, environment, science, government, planning, transportation, agriculture
geotopics: environment, farming, elevation, society, economy, utilitiesCommunication, structure, transportation, inlandWaters, imageryBaseMapsEarthCover, location, health, oceans, boundaries, climatologyMeteorologyAtmosphere, intelligenceMilitary, biota
